6099.verse-arabic: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
6099.verse-english: By the fig and the olive

clauses-arabic.clause: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ

clauses-english.clause: By the fig and the olive

6102.verse-arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
6102.verse-english: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

clauses-arabic.clause: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ

clauses-english.clause: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

6103.verse-english: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

clauses-english.clause: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

6104.verse-arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
6104.verse-english: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

clauses-english.clause: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds,
for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

6105.verse-english: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

clauses-english.clause: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

6106.verse-english: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

clauses-english.clause: Is not God the most just of judges?
